column1: Byt bol plne nadštandardne vybavený vysoko kvalitnými materiálmi a je pripravený pre nového majiteľa.
Vstup do bytového domu je zabezpečený cez video vrátnika.

column3: elektrickej rúry a indukčnej varnej dosky. Obývacia časť ponúka výhľad na západ s panorámou Malých Karpát a Bratislavy.

column1: We offer this newly constructed (2022) 2 bed apartment on the second floor in Chorvatsky Grob. The 47.28m2 apartment is eco friendly and has been fully fitted to standard with high quality material and is now ready to walk in and live.
Entrance to the apartment building is via a secure video intercom. The apartment has a tiled hallway entrance opening up to the kitchen/living area
column3: and a large airy bedroom. The kitchen area consists of new appliances including fridge/freezer
column5: electric oven and induction hob. The living area boosts views of the West with evening sunsets behind the little Carpathians and Bratislava skyline.

column1: The apartment includes underfloor electric heating which is controlled from each room separately. This can also be controlled by wifi alongside the separate hot water boiler. Preparation has also been made for exterior electric blinds and Telekom optics internet.

Included in the price is a private parking space which can be found to the rear of the apartment block with entry via an electric gate. Also included is a cellar/storage room (3.4m2) which can be found opposite the apartment.
In the area of this location is CO-OP supermarket
column6: kindergarten and school all within view of the building. For a short 5min drive you can reach Monar where other shops and amenities can be found.

column1: Ideally located outside of Bratislava the D1 highway can be accessed from a new exit which leads directly to Chorvatisky Grob
column2: drive time to Bratislava around 15min. Also nearby is access onto the newly completed D4 highway for quicker journey times to Austria and Hungary.
